definition: extremely, very lively and profitable, a very loud utterance (like the sound of an animal)
details:
adverb
- extremely
= example: extremely
= synonyms: bloody
adjective
- very lively and profitable
= synonyms: prosperous, booming, flourishing, palmy, prospering, thriving
noun
- a very loud utterance (like the sound of an animal)
= synonyms: bellow, bellowing, holla, holler, hollering, hollo, holloa, roar, yowl
- a deep prolonged loud noise
= synonyms: thunder, boom, roar
